item.title: XThrottling Test [Utilities]
item.itunes:title: XThrottling Test [Utilities]
item.itunes:author: gustyx-power
item.itunes:summary:
XThrottling Test
(Utilities)
A comprehensive Android application for testing CPU throttling behavior under sustained workload. Built with Jetpack Compose and Material Design 3, this app provides real-time performance monitoring, detailed stability analysis, and professional reporting capabilities.

[read more]

item.title: XChatAi [Chat & Messenging]
item.itunes:title: XChatAi [Chat & Messenging]
item.itunes:author: gustyx-power
item.itunes:summary:
XChatAi
(Chat & Messenging)
XChatAi is a modern Android application that provides seamless interaction with advanced AI models through an intuitive and beautiful interface. Built with Jetpack Compose and following Material Design 3 guidelines, it offers a ChatGPT-like experience with unique features including real-time typewriter effects, thinking process visualization, and comprehensive conversation management.

[read more]

item.title: iQPuzzle [Various Games]
item.itunes:title: iQPuzzle [Various Games]
item.itunes:author: ElThoro
item.itunes:summary:
iQPuzzle
(Various Games)
iQPuzzle is a diverting I.Q. challenging puzzle. Pentominos are used as puzzle pieces and more than 350 different board shapes are available, which have to be filled with them.
[list]
[*] [url=https://github.com/ElTh0r0/iqpuzzle/releases/latest]Windows, AppImage, ReactOS, macOS[/url]
[*] [url=https://flathub.org/apps/details/com.github.elth0r0.iqpuzzle]Flatpak[/url]
[*] [url=https://launchpad.net/~elthoro/+archive/iqpuzzle]Ubuntu PPA[/url]
[*] [url=https://software.opensuse.org/download.html?project=home%3AElThoro&package=iqpuzzle]Builds for Debian, Fedora, openSUSE, SLE[/url]
[*] [url=https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/iqpuzzle/]Arch AUR[/url]
[*] [url=https://madb.mageialinux-online.org/show?distribution=cauldron&architecture=x86_64&graphical=0&rpm=iqpuzzle]Mageia Cauldron[/url]
[*] [url=http://www.ecsoft2.org/iqpuzzle]Build for OS/2[/url]
[*] [url=https://github.com/mrbitt/mrbit-overlay/tree/master/games-puzzle/iqpuzzle]Gentoo ebuild[/url]
[*] [url=https://www.freshports.org/games/iqpuzzle]FreeBSD Ports[/url] / [url=https://repology.org/repository/dports]DPorts[/url]
[/list]

Note: The [b]macOS[/b] release was created automatically on a build server and is untested due to missing soft-/hardware! If you are facing any trouble, please create an issue on [url=https://github.com/ElTh0r0/iqpuzzle/issues]GitHub[/url] or post a comment here.
[read more]

item.title: StackAndConquer [Board]
item.itunes:title: StackAndConquer [Board]
item.itunes:author: ElThoro
item.itunes:summary:
StackAndConquer
(Board)
StackAndConquer is a challenging tower conquest board game inspired by [url=https://spielstein.com/games/mixtour]Mixtour[/url]. Objective is to build a stack of stones with at least five stones and a stone with the players color on top.
[list]
[*] [url=https://launchpad.net/~elthoro/+archive/stackandconquer]Ubuntu PPA[/url]
[*] [url=https://software.opensuse.org/download.html?project=home%3AElThoro&package=stackandconquer]Builds for Debian, Fedora, openSUSE, SLE[/url]
[*] [url=https://github.com/ElTh0r0/stackandconquer/releases]Windows, AppImage, macOS (untested)[/url]
[/list]
[b]Help wanted:[/b] Contribution for improved/new CPU scripts is highly welcome! A CPU opponent is created via separate JS script. Manual for creating CPU opponents can be found in the [url=https://github.com/ElTh0r0/stackandconquer/wiki/Create-CPU-opponent]games wiki on GitHub[/url]. Any help in translating the game into other languages would also be greatly appreciated (for more information [url=https://github.com/ElTh0r0/stackandconquer/issues/30]see here[/url])!

Note: The [b]macOS[/b] release was created automatically on a build server and is untested due to missing soft-/hardware! If you are facing any trouble, please create an issue on [url=https://github.com/ElTh0r0/stackandconquer/issues]GitHub[/url] or post a comment here.
[read more]

item.title: K-Ollama [Utilities]
item.itunes:title: K-Ollama [Utilities]
item.itunes:author: dedicate44
item.itunes:summary:
K-Ollama
(Utilities)
**K-Ollama** is a KDE Plasma 6 widget that connects to your [Ollama](https://ollama.ai) server, bringing conversational AI directly to your desktop or panel.
### ✨ Features
- Private LLM chat with no cloud dependency
- Configurable model, prompt, and context
- Works in both panel and desktop form factors
- Adapts to Plasma 6 themes and color schemes

### 🧰 Requirements
An Ollama backend running locally or on your LAN.

---

**Source:** [GitHub – chevybowtie/K-Ollama-Plasmoid](https://github.com/chevybowtie/K-Ollama-Plasmoid)
**License:** LGPL-2.1-or-later
**Status:** Stable – Initial Plasma 6 release

[read more]

item.title: Il fortune di numerone uno [Internet Apps]
item.itunes:title: Il fortune di numerone uno [Internet Apps]
item.itunes:author: numerone
item.itunes:summary:
Il fortune di numerone uno
(Internet Apps)
Il fortune di numerone rivisitato per essere scritto col framework uno.
Si basa su un server esterno di mia proprietà nelle quale ho messo delle massime che escono.
La particolarità è che per sessione non escono doppioni, se non in particolari circostanze.
Vuole essere un fortune teller e va usato sui pc con NPU perché è parzialmente sensiente
The debian packages already includes the libskiasharp and the libharfbuzzsharp for all platforms.
[read more]

item.title: Download AetherSX2 For Linux [Emulation]
item.itunes:title: Download AetherSX2 For Linux [Emulation]
item.itunes:author: litegapps
item.itunes:summary:
Download AetherSX2 For Linux
(Emulation)
AetherSX2 has grown beyond its Android roots and brought great PlayStation 2 emulation to Linux, especially for ARM-based devices. With this change, people can play old PS2 games on devices like the Raspberry Pi and even a Nintendo Switch that has been modified to run Linux.
Installation is usually easy because there are AppImage and Flatpak versions available, which makes it easier for many people to get started. It's highly recommended that you change the graphics renderer from OpenGL to Vulkan for the best performance. This change can make the game run much more smoothly. The original AetherSX2 is no longer being worked on, but it lives on as a great way for Linux users who love retro games to explore the huge PlayStation 2 library.
[read more]

item.title: AetherSX2 For MAC [Emulation]
item.itunes:title: AetherSX2 For MAC [Emulation]
item.itunes:author: litegapps
item.itunes:summary:
AetherSX2 For MAC
(Emulation)
Great news for Mac gamers! AetherSX2, the highly acclaimed PlayStation 2 emulator celebrated for its stellar performance on Android, has officially launched for macOS. This development unlocks the vast and beloved library of PS2 classics for a new audience, specifically optimized for Apple Silicon (M1, M2, and beyond).
Leveraging the power of Apple's modern architecture and the Metal graphics API, AetherSX2 delivers impressive performance and high compatibility. Now, you can enjoy timeless titles like *Final Fantasy X*, *Metal Gear Solid 3*, and *Gran Turismo 4* directly on your MacBook or Mac desktop. Dive back into the golden era of gaming today!
[read more]

item.title: AetherSX2 For Windows [Emulation]
item.itunes:title: AetherSX2 For Windows [Emulation]
item.itunes:author: litegapps
item.itunes:summary:
AetherSX2 For Windows
(Emulation)
AetherSX2 emerged as a highly regarded PlayStation 2 emulator, primarily celebrated for its impressive performance on Android devices. For Windows users, the primary method to run AetherSX2 has been through Android emulators like BlueStacks, which allow PC systems to operate the Android version of the application. This approach grants access to AetherSX2's robust feature set, including resolution scaling, save states, and wide game compatibility, bringing classic PS2 titles to the desktop.
However, the original developer has officially halted the development of AetherSX2. As a result, users seeking the latest updates and bug fixes should now look towards NetherSX2, a community-driven project that continues the legacy of AetherSX2, ensuring ongoing support and improvements for the emulator.
[read more]

item.title: Xtra Kernel Manager - By Xtra Manager Software Project [System Tools (NOT OS or ROMS)]
item.itunes:title: Xtra Kernel Manager - By Xtra Manager Software Project [System Tools (NOT OS or ROMS)]
item.itunes:author: gustyx-power
item.itunes:summary:
Xtra Kernel Manager - By Xtra Manager Software Project
(System Tools (NOT OS or ROMS))
Xtra Kernel Manager is a kernel manager app for Android that allows users to control and optimize CPU performance and other system parameters more easily. Designed to provide a balance between performance and power efficiency, this app is suitable for users who want to get the best experience from their devices.

[read more]
